name: PeabraiN
short_description:
PeabraiN tool is a collection of PIPE (Platform Independent Petri net Editor) modules for computing bounds, resource optimisation, and more bizarre properties on the Petri nets. Namely, the feature supported by PeabraiN are, namely:

Performance Estimation, Resource Optimisation,  Structural Enabling, Structural Marking, Visit Ratio Computation, and SPN Simulation Analysis.

For more details, see the project website at 

http://webdiis.unizar.es/GISED/?q=tool/peabrain
summary: A PIPE Extension for Performance Estimation and Resource Optimisation
